meanings.definition: The quality or state of being uniform.
meanings.sent1: In the classroom, the students wore uniforms to maintain uniformity.
meanings.sent2: The uniformity of the pattern on the wallpaper made the room look neat.
meanings.sent3: The uniformity of the cupcakes made them all look like little soldiers in a row.
meanings.sent4: The uniformity of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The uniformity of the marching band's steps impressed the audience.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being uniform; overall sameness, homogeneity, or regularity.
meanings.sent1: The uniformity of the color in the painting created a calming effect.
meanings.sent2: The uniformity of the test scores indicated a fair evaluation process.
meanings.sent3: The uniformity of the garden's flowers made it look like a rainbow had fallen to the ground.
meanings.sent4: The uniformity of the waves crashing on the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The uniformity of the soldiers' uniforms made them easily recognizable in the crowd.
